top.title: Police identify 18-year-old as suspect in Tumbler Ridge shooting
top.summary: Six people were killed and at least 25 others were injured at a school, and two others were found dead at a nearby home.

top.title: 'It was terrifying': Tumbler Ridge's tight-knit community in shock after shooting
top.summary: Members of the remote community have spoken of their fear and uncertainty after nine people were killed.

top.title: Lyse Doucet: In Tehran, rallies for Iran's revolution overshadowed by discontent and defiance
top.summary: The BBC visits the Iranian capital for the first time since authorities used unprecedented force to put down protests last month.

top.title: Children bombarded with weight loss drug ads online, says commissioner
top.summary: The Children's Commissioner suggested social media advertising for children should be banned.

top.title: Apple and Google agree to change app stores after 'effective duopoly' claim
top.summary: The UK's markets regulator says the proposed commitments "will boost the UK's app economy".

top.title: Instagram and YouTube owners built 'addiction machines', trial hears
top.summary: The tech giants are under scrutiny over social media addiction in a landmark jury trial in Los Angeles
